attributes.action: stop reering to his wife on No10 website as though she were part of the government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many refereneces to Sarah Brown on the No 10 website (G8 ETC) She is not a member of the Government and we do not have a First Lady - or if we do it should be the queen.  Mrs Brown'sactivities are as consort to the PM are notrelevant to the No 10 web site - please remove them.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
